Package jpen.owner

PenOwner definition and various PenOwner implementations.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
PenClip Defines the screen area where PenEvents are fired or a drag-out operation can be started.
PenOwner A PenOwner defines the available PenProviders and unpauses/pauses the PenManager whenever the mouse cursor enters/exits the PenClip.
PenOwner.PenManagerHandle Wraps a PenManager and defines extra accessor methods.
 

Class Summary
AbstractPenOwner Provides a mechanism to start/stop the drag-out operation.
ScreenPenOwner Defines a PenClip for all the screen.
 

Package jpen.owner Description

PenOwner definition and various PenOwner implementations.
